Package src.service.api

Interface AppointmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentServiceImpl
@Service public interface AppointmentService
Provides functionalities for updating and managing appointments.

  • Method Details

    • create

      void create(Integer patientId, AppointmentDTO appointmentDTO) throws InvalidDataException, EntityNotFoundException
      Create a new appointment after the patient has requested it.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the id of the patient
      appointmentDTO - the details of the appointment to be created such as the patient's name, the doctor's name, the type of requested service, etc.
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - if some data is missing or has an invalid value
      EntityNotFoundException - if either the doctor, patient or the medical service cannot be found in the database (non-existent)

    • schedule

      AppointmentDTO schedule(Integer appointmentId, LocalDateTime dateTime) throws InvalidDataException, EntityNotFoundException
      Schedule an appointment by setting the appointment date. This is the responsibility of the receptionist.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      dateTime - the date and time when the appointment will be scheduled
      Returns:
      the appointment containing the new date and with updated status 'Scheduled'
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - if the appointmentDate is missing or invalid, it is before the current date, as appointments cannot be scheduled in the past
      EntityNotFoundException - if no appointment exists with the given id

    • changeSchedulingStrategy

      void changeSchedulingStrategy(String schedulingType)
      Allows switching between the type of strategy used for scheduling appointments and selecting the most appropriate dates.
      Parameters:
      schedulingType - the type of the selected strategy

    • updateStatus

      void updateStatus(Integer appointmentId, Account account, String newStatus) throws InvalidStateException, EntityNotFoundException, InvalidAccessException
      Update the status of the appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      account - the account of the user who wants to perform the update (only the Patient and Receptionist have the right to perform this operation)
      newStatus - the status to be changed to
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the status of the appointment cannot be changed to the new status given its current state, because of the predefined state transition flow for managing appointments
      EntityNotFoundException - if no appointment exists with the given id
      InvalidAccessException - if the user who attempts to modify the status of the appointment doesn't have the right to do it. For ex Patients and Receptionist can only request certain state transitions.

    • findById

      Optional<AppointmentDTO> findById(Integer appointmentId)
      Get an appointment based on its id.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment
      Returns:
      the appointment wrapped in an optional if it was found, otherwise an empty optional.

    • findAllMedicalServices

      List<String> findAllMedicalServices()
      Get all the medical services.
      Returns:
      list of medical service names.

    • findAllAppointmentsByStatus

      List<AppointmentDTO> findAllAppointmentsByStatus(String status)
      Get all the appointments filtered by status.
      Parameters:
      status - is the status based on which the appointments are selected
      Returns:
      the list of appointments with the given status

    • findAllAppointmentsOfPatient

      List<AppointmentDTO> findAllAppointmentsOfPatient(String firstName, String lastName) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get all the appointments of a patient based on its unique name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the patient
      lastName - the last name of the patient
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made by the given patient
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found with the given name

    • findPastAppointmentsOfPatient

      List<AppointmentDTO> findPastAppointmentsOfPatient(Integer patientId) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get all the past appointments of a patient based on its unique id.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the id of the patient
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made by the given patient
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found with the given id

      Parameters:
      patientId - the id of the patient
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made by the given patient
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found with the given id

      firstName - the first name of the doctor
      lastName - the last name of the doctor
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made for a given doctor
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no doctor was found with the given name

      Parameters:
      doctorId - the first id of the doctor
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made for a given doctor
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no doctor was found with the given id

      Returns:
      the list of appointments made for a given doctor

      Parameters:
      doctorId - the first id of the doctor
      Returns:
      the list of appointments made for a given doctor

    • findAvailableDates

      List<LocalDateTime> findAvailableDates(String doctorFirstName, String doctorLastName, String medicalService) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get a list of available dates for scheduling an appointment.
      Parameters:
      doctorFirstName - the first name of the doctor for which the appointment is made
      doctorLastName - the last name of the doctor for which the appointment is made
      medicalService - the name of the requested medical service
      Returns:
      the list of available time slots
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no doctor was found with the given name

    • findDoctorsByMedicalService

      List<DoctorProfileDTO> findDoctorsByMedicalService(String medicalServiceName) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get the list of doctors who are capable to provide the given medical service based on their specialty/field.
      Parameters:
      medicalServiceName - the name of the service
      Returns:
      the list of doctors which qualify
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no medical service was found by the given name

    • filterByPatientAndStatus

      List<AppointmentDTO> filterByPatientAndStatus(Integer patientId, String appointmentStatus) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get a list of appointments made by a given patient and filtered by status.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the id of the patient
      appointmentStatus - the status after which the appointments are filtered
      Returns:
      the list of filtered appointments
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found with the given id
